feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.6.16
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • revert: "perf: Cache app store imports (#17425)" by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17428
  • fix: no availability email frequency fix by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17430
  • fix: update profile photo logic in google cal integration by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17438
  • perf: google cal profile photo by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17441
  • fix: create a wrapper for google calendar fetching by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17440
  • perf: Add more specific spans to getBusyTimes by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17437
  • fix: docs mdx syntax errors by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17450
  • fix: payments tab typo for platform by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17451
  • fix: filter by team url by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17456
  • feat: allow users to generate csv tables for org members by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17458
  • chore: remove no option text by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17457
  • fix: ensure fetching all members before exporting csv by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17461
  • perf: Remove extra spans by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17464
  • chore: v4.6.16 by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17465

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.6.15...v4.6.16

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.6.17
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: add webhook in payload by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17468
  • feat: adding posthog libs for node + js by @abhi-slash-git in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16862
  • chore: settings/platform, settings/license-key - remove pages router and use app router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17384
  • fix: api/routing-forms/responses by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17473
  • chore: add missing i18n to metadata in settings/platform pages by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17476
  • fix: simplify the common schedule toggle check logic by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17439
  • fix: cancelling invalid booking seat apiv2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17484
  • chore: Update build-an-app.mdx by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17486
  • fix: creating recurring seated bookings for same timeslot by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17482
  • feat: instant meeting modal improvements by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17489
  • fix: assign/remove team members to team event-types by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17483
  • perf: Allow bypassing 3rd party calendar busy times by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17492
  • feat: Display who a RR automatic reassign was routed too by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17454
  • feat: docs for payment form atom by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17360
  • feat: Add feature to download routing form reports by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17400
  • feat: docs for event type atom by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17466
  • chore: posthog vars by @nizzyabi in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17494
  • chore: v4.6.17 by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17493

New Contributors

  • @abhi-slash-git made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16862
  • @nizzyabi made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17494

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.6.16...v4.6.17

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.6.18
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: missing responsive design in org members page by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17495
  • fix: broken social media preview and title by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17504
  • feat: Salesforce - on booking write to fields on person record [CAL-4575] by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17477
  • fix: disable all emails modal crash on platform by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17485
  • feat: team availability - vertical selector and align times by @itsalam in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17502
  • fix: routing form: dont disable routing and reporting on mobile and fix mobile layout instead by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17444
  • fix: Don't let the modal close accidentally atleast when loading by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17508
  • chore: Update SettingsLayout.tsx by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17498
  • feat: update translations by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17474
  • fix: copy to clipboard button by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17512
  • feat: Round Robin Skip If contact owner first available slot is more than 2 weeks, round robin as normal [CAL-4651] by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17416
  • fix: Logic fix in Salesforce no-show by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17516
  • chore: Replace prisma actions Credential Repository / SelectedCalendar Repository methods by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17443
  • fix: common schedule toggling incorrectly by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17517
  • fix: saml does not add future members to eventtype by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17522
  • fix: event-type atom tabs controlled by prop by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17480
  • chore: Release v4.6.18 by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17521

New Contributors

  • @itsalam made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17502

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.6.17...v4.6.18

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.6.19
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: cache meeting OG images for 1 day by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17525
  • fix: event types atom docs by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17528
  • fix: booker timezone from preference instead of session by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17520
  • feat: reset RR every month by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17472
  • fix: issues in 'updateNewTeamMemberEventTypes' while adding new team member. by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17513
  • chore: add sentry performance tracking api-v2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17519
  • chore: v4.6.19 by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17524

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.6.18...v4.6.19

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.6.20
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: loom iframe for atoms by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17550
  • fix: move team availability search to serverside by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17549
  • feat: api v2 reassign by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17460
  • feat: adds attendee and host names, and guest emails in forwarded params by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17530
  • fix: pass upId to JWT if logging in through SAML by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17566
  • fix: atoms docs by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17556
  • fix: docs loom iframe fixes by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17569
  • chore: v4.6.20 by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17571

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.6.19...v4.6.20
